ygData.subject: Everyone, Calm Down!
ygData.msgSnippet: As the subject says, everyone calm down! I made a mistake and accused JP of moding, which he didn t do. That does not mean that everyone needs to jump up

As the subject says, everyone calm down! I made a mistake and accused
JP of moding, which he didn't do. That does not mean that everyone
needs to jump up yelling at each other. If things arn't peaceful soon,
everyone will be sent to their respective bases and we'll all have to
sit like little kids and think about what we did. But seriously, lets
calm down and play politely.

Also, KSL, can you please post? I know not everyone you fired at has
responded yet, but not posting is holding everyone up.
